content: this festive throw takes a spin into the sixties with a pattern that resembles glass ornaments the ornaments are joined into strips with the light background setting off the bright colors tails from the strips are gathered into tassels graphic fall throw 1 - we ve re-imagined the wonderful crochet retro ornament throw design replacing the bright colors of the motifs with fall colors designer s video tutorial - motifs 2 designer s video tutorial - strips 3 designer s video tutorial - joining and finishing 4 1 http //www redheart com/free-patterns/graphic-fall-throw 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=nh5qpmdkd24 3 https //www youtube com/watch v=q-6vpdmfyty 4 https //www youtube com/watch v=czforjckpye
